The three "Property Name" entities in the paragraph are "hole mobility", "electron mobility", and "PC 70 BM". "Hole mobility" and "electron mobility" are properties of the polymers and polymer blends, while "PC 70 BM" is a specific type of polymer blend mentioned in the paragraph.

After re-evaluating the paragraph, I have determined that there is only one type of entity present, which are "Material Property" entities. The two entities "hole mobility" and "electron mobility" are both properties of materials, specifically the polymers and polymer blends mentioned in the paragraph. I have removed "PC 70 BM" as it is a specific type of polymer blend, not a material property.
